lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto says it plans to increase production and shipments of iron ore, defying a collapse in prices.

headline.print_headline: Rio Tinto Plans to Increase Production and Shipments
headline.main: Rio Tinto Plans to Increase Production and Shipments

snippet: Rio Tinto says it plans to increase production and shipments of iron ore, defying a collapse in prices.
abstract: Mining firm Rio Tinto says it will increase production and shipments to 350 million tons for 2016, roughly 10 million more than 2015; says higher output will to maintain or raise dividends in spite of falling commodity prices.
